title: Director of Equipment Operations - College Sports
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Director of Equipment Operations   Perform all facets of athletic equipment operation in support of the assigned programs within the athletic department. The facets include purchasing, receiving, maintenance, inventory, storing...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
